name: Purple line Mylo
description:
What is Mylo good for:

Mylo pillow is a perfect relaxation tool, which helps us ignore the busy world around us once is it placed over our eye while we are lying on our back. Even under direct sunlight it can block all light, with its perfect sill. By the soft pressure of the flax-seeds muscles of the eye relax, there for the brain can focus its concentration to the insides, and so under a shorter period of time a more intense relaxation can be achieved. Relaxing the eye while we are awake helps us stimulate the rest of our body, it enhances our creativity, and our intuitional skills.

Why Mylo:

Cos it help you find yourself!
Cos it relaxes, energizes and chills!
Cos it helps with work and with relaxation !
Cos you are not watching but you are still seeing!
Cos it make a great gift for anybody for anything!
